title: Episode 222: Going Public
itunes:title: Episode 222: Going Public
description:
Vann Prime, an award-winning public school teacher from (in his words) a standard public school - not rich, not poor, not magnet or charter - joins us to talk about good things happening at his public school and how we might improve public schools in general.

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!
